entity1.name: Comedy
entity1.description: A genre of performance intended to amuse and entertain, often through humor and satire.;;;Individuals who perform comedy, often using humor to entertain and engage audiences.;;;Individuals who perform comedy, often using humor to address social and political issues.;;;Individuals who perform comedy, often in the form of stand-up routines or sketches to entertain audiences.;;;A genre of performance and literature intended to amuse, entertain, and often provoke laughter or a sense of amusement.;;;An expression or appearance of mirth, pleasure, or amusement, often accompanied by a sound.

entity2.name: Society
entity2.description: The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community, often characterized by shared norms, values, and institutions.;;;The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.

entity4.name: Stress
entity4.description: A state of mental or emotional strain or tension resulting from adverse or demanding circumstances.

entity5.name: Immune System
entity5.description: The system that protects an organism against disease and infection, composed of various cells, tissues, and organs.

entity6.name: Well-being
